narrative: Dropped --verbose flag from twine commands, bumping patch version to 0.2.36 for cleaner TestPyPI publishing.
user_input:
twine upload --repository testpypi dist/*

That is the command that works for all the pypi test publishing, upgrade anything needed
scene: Before: upload used verbose flag and version 0.2.35. After: simplified command and version 0.2.36 ready.
